name: 8586D 2 In 1 Soldering Station, SMD Hot Air Rework Station LED Dual Digital Display with Heat Gun and Solder Iron Kit, Electric Soldering Iron Station with Temperature Control, Auto Sleep Functions
short_description: 2-In-1 Soldering Stations Kit: The 2-in-1 soldering station contains soldering iron station and hot air rework station. They have independent displays, adjustment buttons and control switches, you can use the soldering station and the hot air rework station independently or communally, meeting the needs of different scenarios

Intelligent Temperature Adjustments: The solder station kit provides fast heating speed with a new drive circuit designed, the clear LED displays helps to precisely control the temperature, the temperature of the solder station is adjustable from 356-932℉, the temperature of the hot air gun is adjustable from 212-932℉, besides, it will appear the indication if the temperature of the handle is abnormal

Auto Sleeping: The desoldering station is equipped with an intelligent sensor, when put down the hot air gun handle, it will automatically enter the sleeping mode, when pick up the handle, it will rapidly return to the working state, reduce the high heat damage to the soldering machine when it is not in use, and prolong the service life of the rework iron station

Versatile Functions: The hot air soldering station tools have many useful functions in addition to temperature control and auto-sleep, such as ℃ and ℉ conversion, adjustable air speed of the air gun with a setting range of 10-99, gental wind from the spiral outlet, and a dual-system LED design conveniencing the operation

Essential Accessories: this soldering station kit for electronics contains a 8586D soldering machine with hot air gun and soldering iron station, 1 coil of soldering wire, 1 desoldering pump, 1 tweezers, 1 sponge pad, 3 air nozzles, 5 soldering iron tips, comes with a manual, the complete soldering machine kit is fully considered your needs

name: LRT 858D Digital Hot Air Rework Station for SMD Soldering
short_description: The power of the hot air rework station is 700W, the temperature rises quickly, and the temperature is accurate and stable
The air flow of the heat gun can be adjusted, the air volume is large and soft, the temperature is convenient to adjust, and it is suitable for various purposes
The hot air handle has a built-in sensor switch. Just pick up the handle and immediately enter the working mode; put the handle on the bracket and the system enters the sleep state
The 858D system is equipped with an automatic cold air function, which can extend the life of the heating element and protect the hot air gun
The long life brushless air blower is used in the hot air station, and the noisiness is in a low level

name: TOAUTO DS90 Soldering Station-°F & °C Dual Digital Display Soldering Iron Station Kit,90W Soldering Iron,302℉- 842℉ Temperature, Anti-Static & Grounding Wire, Auto Standby & Sleep,5 Solder Tips, Blue
short_description: 【UPGRADED VERSION-NEW REMOVE STATIC DESIGN & DUAL DIGITAL DISPLAY】 Upgraded to NEW Blue Version DS-90W for orders after March 7, 2022. The TOAUTO DS90 soldering station has a PATENTED UNIQUE grounding wire design & remove-static sheet, letting you focus on desoldering safely. Adding °F / °C dual digital display function, and the LED dual-color dual-row design mode selection is more intuitive, letting you no longer be confused by numbers.

【FAST HEATING & AUTO STANDBY SLEEP】DS90 Soldering Station uses a 90W High power ceramic heating core, heats up quickly, a soldering temperature of 590 °F is reached after about 5 seconds. When not used for 10 minutes, the soldering station automatically enters standby mode, when not used for 20 minutes, it will automatically enter sleep mode. Protecting you, your kids, and your pets from getting hurt.

【INTELLIGENT TEMPERATURE CONTROL】DS90 desoldering station adopts the high-end precision PID program, can monitor and correct the actual temperatures at high speed with fast temperature compensation to provide the accuracy that your projects ask for. In the temperature lock mode, constant temperature operation can be guaranteed.

【MULTIPLE SCENARIOS-IDEAL CHOICE】The upgraded DS90 desoldering station is designed for beginners and experts to provide you with a consistent welding experience.DS90 soldering station is ESD, CE, FCC, RoHS certified safety in use, can be used for PCB / SMD / SMT welding， it is ideal for industry and manufacturing, school laboratory, home, and hobby use, electronic DIY, and repair.

【LUXURIOUS 13-In-1 SOLDERING KIT】Upgraded TOAUTO DS90 Watt Soldering Station with 5 x Additional Soldering Tip,1x Bracket for solder On The Side,1x Roll of Lead-free Solder Wire(30g),1x Solder Sucker,1x Anti-static Tweezers,1x Brass Tip Cleaner, 1x Cleaning Sponge,1x Instruction Manual.TOAUTO will be provided for a 1-year warranty after-sales and lifetime technical support, and a 30-day return.

name: 2 IN 1 750W LED Digital Soldering Station Hot Air Gun Rework Station Electric Soldering Iron For Phone PCB IC SMD BGA Welding SET 110V (8588D SET1)
short_description: ★★★★【Product advantages】This machine is equipped with a heat gun and a soldering iron. With handle induction system, automatic cooling, automatic constant temperature. Dual control switches, the most scientific and fashionable two-in-one design, with high-quality ABS plastic shell, the machine is compact and durable.

★★★★【ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE】has big screen dual blue LED display sets, accurate setting and control temperature at +1°C, temperature adjustment range from 100°C to 480°C (212°F - 896°F), temperature tolerance is within +2°C.
★★★★【Anti-static Design】Anti-static design of the whole machine, effectively eliminate the damage of SMD components. it has also the function of fault self-detection and fault warning.

★★★★【Precautions 1】This product is 110V 60Hz，Before using, Please make sure your address is using 110-120V voltage ,please make sure that the power cord is tightly connected to the machine. Before turning on the power, make sure that the handles of the welding pen and the hot air gun are placed on the tray, and then turn on the two switches on the front of the welding station.
★★★★【CAUTIONS & WARNINGS】For your own safety, please read the manual carefully before using and strictly comply with the rules of "Precautions".

name: WEP 992D+ 2-in-1 Soldering Iron Kit and Hot Air Rework Station with 3 Preset Channels, LCD Display, Interchangeable Handles, Sleep Mode, X-2 Iron Holder, 5 Iron Tips, Desoldering Pump and Tweezers
short_description: In the Box: WEP 992D+ Soldering Kit with tilted LCD display; detachable hot air gun with smooth airflow and brushless blower; detachable soldering iron; 4 nozzles (large, medium, small, square); 5 compatible soldering iron tips from 900M soldering iron tip set (I, B, K, 3.2D, 3C); X-2 multi-functional soldering Iron holder; brass wool tip cleaner; cleaning sponge; hot air gun holder; desoldering pump; tweezers; a roll of lead-free solder wire (0.5mm, 35g); silicone mat (330*209mm); IC extractor

2-in-1 Functionality Soldering Iron Kit: Combines a soldering station and hot air rework station; includes separate power switches; adjustable temperature; airflow control; tilted LCD display for betting and wider viewing angle; 3 memory presets; °F/°C conversion; hot/cool air modes; auto/manual hot air settings; adjustable sleep mode time; built-in PID temperature control for both the soldering iron and hot air station; digital temperature calibration for easy calibration

3 Pre-set Channels: Soldering kit saves and recalls temperature and airflow settings for the soldering iron and hot air soldering station; improve workflow efficiency and save time during repetitive tasks

Detachable Handles: Soldering kit's detachable design for the soldering iron and hot air station; ensures easy replacement and repair; reduces maintenance costs without the need to replace the whole unit
Soldering Station: Temperature range 392℉-896℉ (200℃-480℃); supports sleep mode to minimize unnecessary wear; extends the lifespan of soldering iron tips and heating elements

Hot Air Rework Station: Equipped with a brushless blower for smooth airflow, low noise, and extended lifespan; temperature range 212℉-896℉ (100℃-480℃); maximum airflow 120L/min; includes 4 interchangeable nozzles for versatile soldering and rework applications
°F/°C Conversion: Soldering Iron Kit can select between Fahrenheit and Celsius display for convenience; suitable for various soldering and hot air rework station preferences
Auto/Manual Hot Air Modes: Switch between automatic mode to minimize wear and manual mode for continuous operation; improves hot air station efficiency and tool flexibility
Cool Air Mode: Quickly cool down PCBs with the cool air function on the hot air station; accessible via the air volume knob; LCD displays "COL" when temperature is below 140℉ (60℃)

Exclusive Technical Support: This soldering iron kit is covered by our exclusive 1-year USA technical support, with 24-hour assistance from our dedicated team; WEP offers affordable range of compatible replacements; Note: This product is rated for 110-127V USA specifications; Do not connect this iron to a 220V power socket

name: A9 245 Soldering Station with Digital LCD Display 120W Soldering Iron Station Kit 3 Seconds Fast Heating up 716℉, 212℉-842℉, 3 Temperature Storage, ℃/℉, 3 Soldering Iron Tips
short_description: 3 SECONDS FAST HEATING: This 120W soldering iron kit is equipped with advanced PID temperature control, which heats up quickly from standby temperature in 3 seconds, ensuring stable and precise temperature regulation from 212℉ to 842℉ to meet all your soldering needs.

ONE PIECE SOLDERING IRON TIP: The soldering iron station features a 245-style handle and 3 different types of one-piece heating element tips, which are faster to heat up and easier to replace than individual heating elements and tips.

CLEAR AND EASY-TO-READ DISPLAY: The ergonomically designed soldering station is equipped with an LCD display and operating buttons for adjusting temperature and setting functions for greater ease of use.

WIDE VOLTAGE UNIVERSAL FOR 110V AND 220V: The new generation of digital soldering iron stations has been adjusted ,soldering iron can be universal 110V and 220V two different voltage, making the A9 245 soldering station ideal for a variety of applications such as electronics repairs, hobby projects and intricate handicrafts.

SAFETY AND RELIABILITY: Auto sleep function, the handle into the sleep bracket can quickly sleep, extend the service life of the heater core, pick up the handle can be immediately heated to the set temperature.
product_description: A9 245 Soldering Station with Digital LCD Display 120W Soldering Iron Station Kit 3 Seconds Fast Heating up 716℉, 212℉-842℉, 3 Temperature Storage, ℃/℉, 3 Soldering Iron Tips

short_description: Compatible Battery: Wisehigh Cordless Soldering Station Compatible with Dewalt soldering iron's battery (batteries and charger not included). This portable soldering station helps make electronics repair and DIY gadget repair soldering jobs easier and faster

Convenient design: The cordless soldering station is designed with 2 auxiliary helpers. The upgraded helper design makes your welding process more convenient and safer. Free your hands, the maximum load-bearing capacity of the auxiliary helpers is 0.88 lbs (400g), and the recommended welding size is 5.9*14.7 inches (150*200 mm). Whether it is various welding projects, home DIY fixing work, electrical, electronics, electrical appliance repair, or circuit board welding, it can be easily handled

Fast Heating & Adjustable Temperature: The soldering station can quickly heat up to 662℉ within 10-14s, which saves your waiting time and completes the welding work more efficiently and quickly. You can adjust the temperature from 212°F - 932°F and the temperature unit according to your needs by pressing the "+" "-" keys and the temperature reading is displayed on the digital display to facilitate your welding work

Safe To Use: Compatible with Dewalt soldering iron is made of high-quality material TPE and metal alloy, with built-in low voltage protection. The portable soldering iron station can be used for industrial and manufacturing soldering and home appliance repair. After the soldering iron handle is still for 30 minutes, it enters the automatic shutdown state, and the LCD screen does not display that the soldering iron has stopped heating. Or press and hold the switch button for 2.5s to shut down

DCL&STB Mode: When the display of the LCD digital soldering station shows DCL, it means that your battery is low and needs to be charged in time. In addition, our welding station enters STB standby mode if it is not used within 8 minutes after it is started, Greatly prolongs the service life of the soldering station

Usage Scenario: Whether you are a hobby-level welder or a professional. This compact soldering station kit can provide you with professional soldering work and save working space. Compatible with Dewalt soldering iron for a variety of soldering projects, home DIY stationary jobs, electrical, electronics, appliance repair, circuit board soldering, and other DIY applications

name: YIHUA 853D 2A USB SMD Hot Air Rework Soldering Iron Station, DC Power Supply 0-15V 0-2A with 5V USB Charging Port and 35 Volt DC Voltage Test Meter
short_description: 1 = 3 – You now get three professionally integrated stations in one compact package. The 853D Series comes equipped with a soldering iron station, a hot air rework station, and a DC power supply (with voltmeter mode). All three stations can be used simultaneously or independently.

Specifications – You can set the soldering station from 392~896°F, the hot air rework station from 212~896°F with adjustable air volume (120L/Min Max.), the DC power supply from 0~2A / 0~15V in output mode or, measure 0~35V DC in test mode. We equipped the station with a 0.5A/5V USB port so you can test or work on devices while they're powered.

Precision – Both the soldering station and the hot air rework station comes with high precision PID temperature stabilization function to maintain them at the set temperature. This way, you can enjoy a more efficient and smoother soldering/rework experience.

Extended Lifespan – A series of assistive functions to help preserve your station in mint condition for longer. You'll not only save on electricity bills but also the cost to replace wearable parts. These functions include sleep mode, automatic shut-down, and more.Read and follow safety guidelines and instruction manuals that come with the product before using it.

Choose YIHUA with Confidence – Enjoy our 12-month US- exclusive manufacturer technical coverage and 24/7 professional assistance on Amazon. Note: This model is designed to operate on 110-127V with a US-standard power plug.

short_description: Fast Heating & Adjustable Temperature - This digital soldering station heats up fast and has a wider temperature range (194℉~896) to choose from. The soldering iron can stay at the set temperature consistently with its PID temperature stabilization. This product conforms to the UL Standard (U.S.), [an Important Evaluation for Electric Appliances Safety].

Space Saving – This compact soldering station helps save precious work space with an integrated soldering iron holder to provider greater space saving. The metallic protective mesh at the rear of the station prevents accidental contact with the soldering iron, and the mesh comes with soldering tip storage slots.

Functions & Features – includes easy °C to °F conversion, Sleep Mode (5/10/30 mins adjustable), and Digital Temperature Calibration. All functions and temperature read-outs are displayed via a digital display, and accessed via a master control knob. The station enters sleep mode when non-use is detected for longer than the set duration to reduce unnecessary wear for the soldering tip and heating element.

12-IN-1 – This soldering iron kit includes the YIHUA 926 III Soldering Station, 2 Helping Hands, 6 Soldering Tips(YIHUA #1200/900M Series), Roll of Lead-free Solder Wire (35g), Solder Sucker, ESD Safe Tweezers, Solder Wire Dispenser, Cleaning Sponge.
